title.narrative: Bangladesh Development Food Assistance Program - Nobo Jatra

description.narrative: FFP is funding a USAID Implementing Partner and their partner organizations to improve gender equitable food security, nutrition, and resilience among children, youth, and pregnant and lactating women in southwestern Bangladesh. The program incorporates multiple sectors in its intervention strategy, including agriculture and alternative livelihoods, disaster risk reduction, social accountability, maternal and child health, and water, sanitation, and hygiene services. The program is currently being jointly implemented in partnership with Bangladeshs Ministry of Disaster Management and Relief (MoDMR).
